ack.p: We would like to thank the Unidad Universitaria de Secuenciación Masiva y Bioinformática (UUSMB) of the Instituto de Biotecnología, UNAM, for advice on DNA sequencing and bioinformatic analysis. The UUSMB is part of the Laboratorio Nacional de Apoyo a las Tecnologías en Ciencias Genómicas which was created and funded by the Programa de Laboratorios Nacionales CONACyT. We also express our gratitude to the working team from the Molecular Biology Department of the Laboratorio Central de Epidemiología for technical assistance. Finally, we would like to thank Dr. Carlos Arias for his feedback and discussion for this manuscript.
